content.full_text: James Wiley to Jesse B. Thomas or Abraham Lincoln, 21 January 18461 Will please to deliver toD DavisEsqr. the mortgage agt[against]Levi Knott, which I left withJudge  Thomas2for collection–3
paragraphs: James Wiley to Jesse B. Thomas or Abraham Lincoln, 21 January 18461
Will please to deliver toD DavisEsqr. the mortgage agt[against]Levi Knott, which I left withJudge  Thomas2for collection–3

footnotes.text:
1James Wiley wrote and signed the letter. David Davis authored the docketing on the
                  back page.
3Davis and Wiley both lived inMcLean County, Illinois, which may be why Davis was tasked with delivering the document to Wiley.
